title: Epic Buys Rocket League Developer - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.02.19
description:
Get Freshly dipped strawberries at http://berries.com with promo code: KFGAMES

Get one dozen assorted roses for $19.99  at http://proflowers.com and use promo code: KFGAMES

Rocket League developer Psyonix has been acquired by Epic, PlaySation 5 hardware talk, and Borderlands 3 details with Fran and Micahel from Game Revolution.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:23 - Housekeeping
Vancouver Meet and Greet is SATURDAY! - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, James Davis, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:59 - Epic Buys Rocket League Developer Psyonix By Michael McWhertor (Polygon)
00:15:44 - Borderlands 3 Campaign May Be 30+ Hours By PC Gamer
00:25:20 - Fortnite Adds Shadow Bomb
00:27:50 - AMD’s PlayStation 5 “Special Sauce” Eddie Makuch (GameSpot)
00:34:50 - Out today
00:37:00 -  Sherries Berries
00:40:30 - ProFlowers
Reader mail   -
00:46:30 - Yesterday it was announced that Epic bought Psyonix, the awesome studio behind rocket league and also the home of the great Jeremy Dunham (Beyond!) This got me thinking, "How did we not see this coming?" - Dapper Stephen With a PH
00:48:45 - Are there any game genres or styles that you used to hate, but now love or will at least try? And what made you change your mind? - Chris from Richmond, VA
00:54:50 - Should Randy properly aligned his messaging, on microtransactions in borderlands 3, at the reveal with what 2k Games would say? - Alex Russ (Zero Syndicate)
01:02:35 - Fran (Discord.gg/FM3) Sea of thieves
01:01:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Tim
